removeChild(int) - Method in interface rmi.tree.RMITreeNode
 
removeChild(RMITreeNode) - Method in interface rmi.tree.RMITreeNode
 
removeChild(int) - Method in class rmi.tree.RMITreeNodeImpl
 
removeChild(RMITreeNode) - Method in class rmi.tree.RMITreeNodeImpl
 
removeNeighbor(int) - Method in interface rmi.graph.RMIGraphNode
 
removeNeighbor(RMIGraphNode) - Method in interface rmi.graph.RMIGraphNode
 
removeNeighbor(int) - Method in class rmi.graph.RMIGraphNodeImpl
 
removeNeighbor(RMIGraphNode) - Method in class rmi.graph.RMIGraphNodeImpl
 
rmi.client - package rmi.client
Contains classes which creates rmi client for remotable objects.
rmi.graph - package rmi.graph
Contains classes related to the behavior of a remotable object which is a graph node.
rmi.server - package rmi.server
Contains classes which creates rmi server for remotable objects.
rmi.tree - package rmi.tree
Contains classes related to the behavior of a remotable object which is a tree node.
RMIGraphNode - Interface in rmi.graph
An interface of a remotable object which is able to receive data from its neighbors and send it to its neighbors.
RMIGraphNodeClient - Class in rmi.client
A client which send data to the node of your choice of remotable objects which will be propagate to its leaves
RMIGraphNodeClient() - Constructor for class rmi.client.RMIGraphNodeClient
 
RMIGraphNodeImpl - Class in rmi.graph
An implementation of the RMIGraphNode interface.
RMIGraphNodeImpl(String, List<RMIGraphNode>) - Constructor for class rmi.graph.RMIGraphNodeImpl
Initialize a RMIGraphNodeImpl with his neighbors.
RMIGraphNodeServer - Class in rmi.server
A server which creates a remotable graph node object which receives data from its neighbors and sends it to its neighbors.
RMIGraphNodeServer() - Constructor for class rmi.server.RMIGraphNodeServer
 
RMITreeNode - Interface in rmi.tree
An interface of a remotable object which is able to receive data from its father(s) and send it to its child(ren).
RMITreeNodeClient - Class in rmi.client
A client which send data to the root of a tree or the node of your choice (if specified) of remotable objects which will be propagate to its leaves
RMITreeNodeClient() - Constructor for class rmi.client.RMITreeNodeClient
 
RMITreeNodeImpl - Class in rmi.tree
An implementation of the RMITreeNode interface.
RMITreeNodeImpl(String, RMITreeNode) - Constructor for class rmi.tree.RMITreeNodeImpl
Initialize a RMITreeNodeImpl with the father father and no child.
RMITreeNodeServer - Class in rmi.server
A server which creates a remotable tree node object which receives data from its father and sends it to its children.
RMITreeNodeServer() - Constructor for class rmi.server.RMITreeNodeServer
